body_html: No objection to using the same protobuf version from cmake and bazel. I'd recommend we update the cmake files to extract the protobuf version from workspace.bzl instead of hardcoding a value in protobuf.cmake
body_text: No objection to using the same protobuf version from cmake and bazel. I'd recommend we update the cmake files to extract the protobuf version from workspace.bzl instead of hardcoding a value in protobuf.cmake
body: No objection to using the same protobuf version from cmake and bazel. I'd recommend we update the cmake files to extract the protobuf version from workspace.bzl instead of hardcoding a value in protobuf.cmake
